about_the_game:
In this addictive solitaire game the Princess of the Kingdom, your sister has fallen in a deep sleep for days and no one has been able to wake her! It's now clear that this is the work of an evil spell. To break the spell, you must find the Elixir of Awakening. The journey will be long and dangerous, but it's your sister's only hope. Venture out into the wonderful world of The Far Kingdoms and complete unique solitaire challenges to retrieve the elixir and save your sister!

- More than 100 solitaire levels
- Save your sister from an evil spell
- Collect precious rings
- Earn coins and buy many powerful boosters
